topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541e270563687246c03b0000#post_541e270563687246c03b0000
[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541e263b6368726dc6c30000#post_541e263b6368726dc6c30000
I think they basically kind of intertwined each other. [/bq]
What tends to happen is <x> is underground -> <x> becomes mainstream -> <y> is the new underground thing -> <y> becomes mainstream.

Right now there seems to be a fuckton of new things becoming mainstream.  Before the internet there was only like one or two things every generation that went mainstream every decade; now there seems to be dozens upon dozens.
